name: DeadLine Day
description:
DeadLine Day made by 5 students from Priestley College in Warrington UK. These are second year and students taking a Btec level 3 in Game Design. This is their first attempt at a Game Jam ran over 4 days. They were given the theme "Coffee Dreams Zombie Screams". They had 28 hours directed time to build it.

Description: its deadline day and you need to get to the copier to print the final sheets of your project except there is nothing but Zombie Students in your way. Destroy them with your Keyboard before its too late.

This is working Prototype, there maybe be bugs we plan to fix and an update will be available soon. This is what we had at the end of the Jam. Hope you enjoy.
